lead_paragraph: Mr. Rezaian left an American military hospital in Germany, the last of the three Americans who flew there from Iran on Sunday to return home.

headline.print_headline: Freed Reporter Returns to U.S. on Boss’s Private Jet
headline.main: Jason Rezaian Travels to U.S. on Washington Post Owner’s Plane

snippet: Mr. Rezaian left an American military hospital in Germany, the last of the three Americans who flew there from Iran on Sunday to return home.
abstract: Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian leaves American military base in Germany aboard personal jetliner owned by newspaper's owner, Jeff Bezos; accompanied by his wife and mother on flight, Rezaian issues statement expressing his gratitude for lengthy efforts made on his behalf in negotiating release.
